forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, a gentle cloud blanket settles in, offering a soft, muted embrace to the city’s vibrancy. The air carries a hint of dampness, a suggestion of drizzle teasing the horizon as the low temperature hovers comfortably around 56 degrees. A west-southwest breeze dances through the streets, adding a refreshing edge that lifts the lightly tangled strands of hair and stirs the leaves of street-side trees. The chance of precipitation remains modest, teasing the idea of cool raindrops falling softly before dawn.

Tomorrow promises a flicker of warmth, with gray skies drifting into a mild high of 63, though the afternoon will bring a slight descent towards 61. Scattered showers are hinted at, particularly early in the day, but the sun may press through the cloud curtain, offering moments of clarity in an otherwise gentle, overcast canvas. Layered clothing would serve well against the cool winds – a light jacket over a comfortable sweater should be enough to ward off the evening chill. As you traverse the city's legendary hills or find yourself savoring a quiet moment with a favorite book at a cozy café, embrace the subtle gloom of the approaching marine layer; it lends a contemplative air to your surroundings. 

The hints of drizzle and soft winds create the perfect backdrop for a quiet evening stroll along the waterfront or an intimate dinner in one of the charming local eateries, where the warmth of your surroundings will balance the cool evening air, making for a night that promises gentle repose rather than bustling excitement.
